Question: On 14 December 1784, this person became a Freemason, admitted to the lodge Zur Wohltätigkeit ("Beneficence").
Hints: This person no longer borrowed large sums from Puchberg, and made a start on paying off his debts.
The ____s sent their son Karl Thomas to an expensive boarding school, and kept servants.
This person was interred in a common grave, in accordance with contemporary Viennese custom, at the St.
